snippet: “Ways to Modernism,” an exhibition in Vienna, looks at the contrasting styles of two early Modernist architects.
abstract: Alice Rawsthorn Critic's Notebook on exhibit Ways to Modernism: Josef Hoffmann, Adolf Loos and Their Impact at MAK, Austrian Museum of Applied Arts/Contemporary Art in Vienna; exhibit compares competing visions of modernist architects Hoffman and Loos at time when new generation is paying attention to their work.
lead_paragraph: “Ways to Modernism,” an exhibition in Vienna, looks at the contrasting styles of two early Modernist architects.

headline.seo: Josef Hoffmann and Adolf Loos, Contrasting Modernist Architects
headline.main: Two Architects, Two Visions, One Diptych of Early Modernism

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Austrian Museum of Applied Arts / Contemporary Art (Vienna, Austria)
